name: Ewar
description:
WASD -> Movement

Mouse -> Aim

LMB -> Electronic Stun

RMB -> Scrambling Wave

• Firing a stun at enemies stuns them

• Releasing a scrambling wave destroys stunned enemies

• Enemies destroyed by your scrambling wave release waves that stun normal enemies and destroy other stunned enemies, causing a chain reaction!


Try to get the biggest chain without dying!


Music: Gerald Iragorri

Programming & Art: James J. Linden
